page.title: 14 SHOPPING
page.content: There are quite a few shops around the Market Place, West Street and High Street. Most of the shops that are empty and sold are turned into Estate Agents or Building Societies. The survey was held during June and 100 shoppers were interviewed. 73% of the shoppers lived in Long Sutton. Half of the shoppers come by car since parking facilities are good. Most shoppers come 2/3 times a week. 76% of the shoppers think that Long Sutton is a good place to shop. But people think there should be a large super market; in fact one is planned. 75% of the people interviewed come to Long Sutton's open-air market.
